name: OutOfShape Spring Playtest 3
description:
Since our game is still in development feedback is very much appreciated. Feel free to fill out the survey form provided. Thank you very much for taking the time to play our demo! You will find the download link below with instructions on how to run it. Unfortunately, we can only provide a windows build at this time.
